title: Badminton - Shi beats Lin to win All England final
text: March 18, 2018 / 3:40 PM / Updated 2 hours ago Badminton - Shi beats Lin to win All England final Reuters Staff 1 Min Read (Reuters) - Seventh seed Shi Yuqi beat compatriot Lin Dan to win an all-Chinese final of the All England Open badminton championships in Birmingham on Sunday. Badminton - Yonex All England Open Badminton Championships - Arena Birmingham, Birmingham, Britain - March 18, 2018 Taiwan's Tai Tzu Ying celebrates with the trophy after victory in the women's singles final Action Images via Reuters/Peter Cziborra Shi, last year’s runner-up, won the opening game 21-19 against the six-time champion. Slideshow (2 Images) Lin, the sixth seed and twice an Olympic gold medallist, came back to take the second game 21-16 but was outplayed in the third, trailing 11-2 at the mid-game break and losing it 21-9. In the women’s final top seed and defending champion Tai Tzu Ying of Taiwan beat second seed Akane Yamaguchi from Japan 22-20 21-13. Reporting by Steve Tongue; Editing by Toby Davis
